title: Kristin Addresses Her On-Air Comment That Struck A Nerve With Listeners
description:
A few weeks ago, Kristin said something on-air that she never expected to hit a nerve with listeners. She received more emails than ever or this! So today, she's addressing listeners' concerns.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
